content: this is a free pattern for the wee version of the yipyip - can be used as a keychain or purse/backpack fob or mini hanger if you add a chain at the top super cute and ridiculous share joy straight off the hook any size 4 yarn will do - i have used a variety of brands and generally speaking scrap amounts will also suffice - a great way to get through your stash the pattern contains a link to the youtube tutorial if you run into any tricky bits just go watch enjoy
